import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function EditClient(props) { let {id} = useParams(); const [quote, SetQuote] = useState(null); useEffect(()=>{ fetch("/client/edit") .then(res => res.json()) .then((result) => { SetQuote(result)}, (error) => {setError(error)} )}) return (

); } export default EditClient;
